author: dimensionallava
title: anti-sciencers?
text: Re: anti-sciencers? Originally Posted by dimensionallava Whats a good word for someone who denies science? Such as Creationists, climate change/global warming deniers, and others like them. A person who accepts general science is not a part of a special group, anymore than someone who accepts basic math. I do not understand the theory of gravity and I haven't studied it at all, but i accept that its real. Just like global warming, and evolution I'm not an expert in environmental science, or biology, but because the people who do study these subjects claim global warming and evolution is real I accept it If someone for whatever reason decided to deny another kind of science for example flat earthers, then should I be considered a round earther? Even though im just going along with whatever basic science tells us? I am not an evolutionists, or climate changeist, anymore than i am a round earther. So whats a good word for someone who denies basic science? and whats a good word for someone believes in basic science? They are plain and simple Conspiracy Theorists but, just for fun maybe they could be called 'Scoofers' (Science Troofers). We are negotiating about dividing a pizza and in the meantime israel is eating it (With thanks to justabubba) If Israel were to take someone and cut of his head, some of you would post that he still has arms and legs.
